testcase.failure: Given Android on the main screen............................................passed When Android clicks a physical product......................................passed And Android clicks "Sepete Ekle" with textview..............................passed And Android clicks "Giriş Yap / Üye Ol" button..............................passed And Android clicks Üye Ol button............................................passed And Android fills in the information in the form with valid values..........passed And Android clicks Sepetim button...........................................passed And Android clicks "Satın Al" with textview.................................passed And Android clicks "Adres Ekle" with textview...............................passed And The Android fills in the information on the address page................passed Then Android verifies that they have successfully added the address.........undefined And Android clicks OK button................................................skipped And Android clicks my basket icon...........................................skipped And Android clicks buy icon.................................................skipped And Android clicks continue button..........................................skipped And Android clicks Bank transfer radio button...............................skipped And Android clicks continue button..........................................skipped And Android clicks preinformation check box.................................skipped And Android confirm order button............................................skipped Then Android verifies order created message is visible......................skipped
